alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wabasha County through 800 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mazeppa, or 18 miles south of Red Wing, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wabasha and Kellogg around 745 PM CDT. Alma around 750 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Jarrett, Pioneer Campground, West Newton, Zumbro Bottoms Campground, Oak Center, Conception, Zumbro Falls, County Roads 18 And 4, West Albany and County Roads 33 And 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
